Articles.Content: Basically I was heading over to the mun, and I was dropping hundreds of alt+f5s, as it was my first time and on my previous run I quicksaved at a point where I couldn't slow down, so I made sure that wouldn't happen again. Now I'm just double checking, can I just delete them regularly? It won't revert my game or anything? Thank you
Yes, you can delete unneeded/outdated quicksaves without affecting your progress.
